content: Congratulations on your journey and your success! I’ll just add here that taking photographs works the same way. My wife is always surprised that I take 100 photos at a time of the dog (or whatever) but I always tell her, “You never know which one is a masterpiece.” And then when I do winnow them down, yep, there really IS a truly amazing photo in there that makes me look like a genius artist when, in reality, my only “talent” is pressing the gat-damn shutter button more often than other people.
